summary: The Ethiopian King offers his daughter to a powerful Pharaoh to secure peace between the two countries.
cast: Emil Jannings|Paul Biensfeldt|Friedrich Kühne|Albert Bassermann|Harry Liedtke|Paul Wegener|Lyda Salmonova|Dagny Servaes|Mady Christians|Tina Dietrich|Bernhard Goetzke|Waldemar Potier|Elsa Wagner
title: La mujer del Faraón
